page.title: 05THE MANOR NURSING HOME (2)
page.content:
The Nursing Home also has a private surgery.When we walked into the surgery it smelt as if it had just been disinfected.The Surgeon,Mr Rogers told us that they had just finished surgery.We were shown some instruments that were used at surgery.We were shown an Operating Microscope.We looked at the surgeon's hand through it.There was also an Argon Lazer,bone nibblers,bone cutters,artery forceps and Telescope enlargers with which you you look into a tummy and it enlarges it.We were then told to take our shoes off.Then we went into the main Theatre. Here we were shown an Antiseptic machine and a Dithripulator which keeps you alive if you have a heart attack.
by Kathryn and Sarah
